text: Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand? Moem, ki ruzi [va maisati] ononro dar zindagii dunjo mijonason taqsim kardaem va ononro nisʙat ʙa ham ʙa daracote ʙartari ʙaxsidaem, to az xadamoti [mutaqoʙili] jakdigar istifoda kunand va rahmati Parvardigorat az amvole, ki cam' mekunand, ʙehtar ast
